Answer: larywl main ، aghwaraay zayada azahaar aur msthakm andaza main bnyady klaswn tak rsaiy kay l a ayk sadha aur bdyhay antrfys mhaya karty hayn۔fysdas aap ko braha rast anstynyt ya un kay sath bat chyt kyay baghair pychydha klaswn aur ajzaaa ki khsawsayat ko astamal karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔wha ayk sadha sy API fraham karty hain jo bnyady nfaza ki pychydghy ko chhpata haay۔ yahan keh larywl main kis tarah kam kya jata haay: aghwala klas: ayk aghwaraa bnyady tawr par ayk bnyady tabkay kay liye ayk msthakm praksy haay۔larywl aam ajzaaa ، jesay dayta bys ، kyshay ، syshn ، aur bohat kuch kay liye blt un fysdaza ka ayk syt fraham krta haay۔har aghwaraay main ayk isi klas hawty hay jo alywmynyt \ spwrt \ facades nam ki jghha main waka hawty haay۔ astytk rsaiy: facades ayk msthakm antrfys mhaya karty hain ، js sy aap un kay tarykwn tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔

Question: larywl kay karyghr kmanda lain twl ka mksad kya haay؟aam karyghr ahakamat aur un kay astamal ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: larywl ka karyghr kmanda lain twl ayk taaktwr twl hay jo mkhtlf trkyaty kamwn main mdd krta hay ، bshmwl kwda jnryshn ، dayta bys hajrt ، chlanay waly tyst aur bohat kchh۔yha kmanda lain sy aam kamwn ko amly jamha phananay ka ayk aasan tarykha fraham krta haay۔mshtrkha karyghr kay ahakamat aur un kay astamal ki kuch msaalyn yeh hayn: py aych py aartyzan lst: is kmanda main un ki tfsayl kay sath tamam dstyab karyghr kmandawn ki fharst di hogi haay۔kntrwlrza daairktry۔tyar krdha kntrwlr main shrwa karnay kay liye kuch bwailr plyt kwda shaml hawgha۔ py aych py aartyzan bnaiyn: madal prwdakt: yeh kmanda ayk nya fsaahat madal tyar krta hay js ka nam liya gaya haay۔

Question: dayta bys ki karrwaiywn ko anjam denay kay l Lar aap larywl kay dayta bys kwiry bldar ki wzuahat aur astamal kesay karty hayn؟
Answer: larywl ka dayta bys astfsar bldar dayta bys kay swalat ki tamyr aur is par aml draamd kay liye ayk aasan aur rwany wala API fraham krta haay۔yha aap ko kchay ays kyw ayl swalat braha rast lkhay baghair apnay dayta bys kay sath bat chyt karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yhaan aap larywl main astfsar bldar ki wzuahat aur astamal krsktay hayn: shrwaat krna: astfsar bldar ko astamal karnay kay l you ، aap ko pehlay apni fail kay awpry hasaay main day by ka aghwaraa draamd karnay ki zurwrt haay: py aych py kwpy kwdawza alywmynyt \ spwrt \ facades \ DB ؛ mntkhb karna dayta:ksy tybl sy dayta ko bazayaft karnay kay l you ، aap tybl kay nam aur chyn kay tarykwn jesay slykt ، kahan ، aardar baiy wghyrha ki wzuahat kay liye astamal krsktay hain ، astfsar ki tamyr kay l .۔msaal kay tawr pr: py aych py kwpy kwda $ saarfyn = day by :: tybl ('saarfyn') -> mntkhb karain ('nam' ، 'ay myl') -> kahan ('ayktw' ، sch) -> aardar baiy ('nam' ، 'ASC') -> get () ؛ ``

Question: larywl main bay chyn lwdangh kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur is ko talkat kay sath dayta bys kay swalat ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: bay chyn lwdangh larywl main ayk tsawr hay jo aap ko mtaalbha par sst rwy sy lanay kay bjaiay mtalkha madalza aur un kay talkat ko samnay lanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔talkat ko bay taby sy lwda karnay sy ، aap dayta bys kay swalat ki tadad ko nmayan tawr par kam krsktay hain aur apni drkhwast ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnasktay hayn۔ jab larywl main talkat kay sath kam karnay sy ، pehlay sy taay shuda slwk sst lwdangh hawta hay ، js ka mtalb hay keh mtalkha madal sirf jab tak rsaiy haasal karty hain tou dayta bys sy bhry hawty haay۔taham ، sst lwdangh sy "N+1 astfsar ka msilha" pyda hawskta hay ، msaal kay tawr par ، agar aap kay pas 100 pwsts ka mjmwaha hay aur hr pwst kay msanf ko bazayaft karna chahti hain tou ، sst lwdangh kay ntyjay main 101 swalat pyda hon ga (1 kay liye astfsarmsanfyn ko lanay kay liye pwsts aur 100 azuafy swalat)۔yha ayk prfarmns ki rkawt bn sakta haay۔ aywr lwdangh is msilay ko ayk hi swal main mtalkha tamam madalza aur un kay talkat ko lanay sy hal krty hay ، jo zayada mwsar haay۔yhaan aap larywl main bay chyn lwdangh ka astamal krsktay hayn: talkat ki wzuahat kryn: is bat ko ykyny bnaiyn keh aap nay apnay madalza kay mabyn talkat ki wzuahat haasmany ، talk sy mtalk ، haaswn ، wghyrha jesay mnasb tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey kya hay ، msaal kay tawr par ، agar aap kay pas haay۔

Question: aap larywl main ay myl kesay bhyj saktay hayn؟myl daraiywrwn ki tshkyl aur ay myl bhyjnay kay aml ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: larywl main ، blt un myl srws kay zaryaha ay myl bhyjna aasan bnaya jata haay۔larywl mkhtlf myl daraiywrwn ، jesay ays aym ty py ، mylghn ، bhyjnay aur bohat kuch ka astamal karty hoey ay myl bhyjnay kay liye ayk mthad API fraham krta haay۔as aml ka ayk jaizaha yahan haay: myl daraiywr ko tshkyl dyn: sab sy pehlay ، aap ko apnay larywl ayply kyshn main myl daraiywr ko tshkyl denay ki zurwrt haay۔tshkyl/myl daat py py py knfyghryshn fail khwlyn aur apni mntkhb krdha myl srws kay liye mnasb daraiywr aur asnad mrtb kryn۔msaal kay tawr par ، agar aap ays aym ty py daraiywr astamal krrhaay hain tou ، aap ays aym ty py srwr ki tfsaylat aur twsayk ki asnad fraham karain ghay۔aap myk: myl aartyzan kmanda ka astamal karty hoey ayk niy myl aybl klas tyar krsktay hayn: shyl kwpy kwdap aartyzan myk: myl wylkm myl yeh ayp/myl daairyktry main ayk wylkm myl klas tshkyl dy gha۔ ay myl ko khtm kryn: tyar krdha wylkm myl khwlyn

Question: "larywl kay mjmwaay kya hayn؟ aap mjmwawn par aapryshn kesay karty hain ، jesay fltrngh ، mypngh ، aur kam krna؟"
Answer: larywl kay mjmwaay dayta ki safwn kay sath kam karnay ka rwany aur aasan tarykha fraham karty hayn۔wha sadha py aych py srnywn ko astamal karnay aur mkhtlf aapryshnza ، jesay fltrngh ، mypngh ، kam karna ، aur bohat kuch karnay kay liye wsya pymanay par tarykwn ki pysh ksh karnay ka mtbadl hayn۔yhaan larywl kay mjmwawn kay sath kam karnay ka ayk jaizaha haay: ayk mjmwaha bnana: aap jma karnay waly mddghar fnkshn ka astamal krkay ya kesi mwjwdha saf ko kesi mjmwaha main tbdyl krkay ayk mjmwaha tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr pr: py aych py kwpy kwda $ jma karna = jma karain ([1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5]) ؛ fltrngh dayta: klykshn mkhsawsa shraita par mbny dayta ko fltr karnay kay tarykay fraham karty hayn۔aap fltr ka tarykha astamal krsktay hain ، jo kal byk fnkshn ko kbwl krta hay takha is bat ka tayn kya jaskay keh fltrda klykshn main kon sy anasar ko shaml kya jana chahaiay۔msaal kay tawr pr: py aych py kwpy kwda $ fltrda = $ klykshn-> fltr (fnkshn ($ aaitm) {wapsy $ aaitm> 2 ؛}) ؛ nkshha sazay ka dayta: hr aaitm ko kesi mjmwaha main tbdyl karnay kay l you ، aap nkshha ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yha hr aaitm par kal byk fnkshn ka atalak krta hay aur is kay sath ayk nya mjmwaha tshkyl dyta hay

Question: drkhwast ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay l lar larywl main kychngh kay tsawr aur larywl kay kychngh mykanzam ko kis tarah astamal kya jaye is ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: kychngh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo fwry tawr par bazayaft kay l frequently ksart sy haasal krdha dayta ya kmpywtda ntaij ko kyshay main ، jesay mymwry ya dask main zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔larywl nay taaktwr kychngh mykanzam mhaya kya hay jo dayta lanay ki zurwrt ko kam krkay ya bar bar mhanghay kmpywtwn ko anjam denay ki zurwrt ko kam krkay aap ki drkhwast ki karkrdghy ko bohat bhatr bnasktay hayn۔yhaan larywl main kychngh ka ayk jaizaha haay: kyshay daraiywr: larywl baks sy bahar mkhtlf kyshay daraiywrwn ki hamayt krta hay ، js main fail ، dayta bys ، mym kychda ، rydays aur bohat kuch shaml haay۔aap mtalwbha kyshay daraiywr ko knfygh/kyshay.f py knfyghryshn fail main tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔ kychngh dayta: larywl main kyshay kay aadad wa shmar kay l you ، aap kyshay ka aghwaraa astamal krsktay hain ، jo ayk sadha aur azahaar khyal API fraham krta haay۔yad rkhnay kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey kesi ntyjay ko kych karnay ki ayk msaal yeh haay: py aych py kwpy kwda $ wylyw = kyshay :: yad rakhien ('klyd' ، $ syknda ، fnkshn () {// kymt pyda karnay ya lanay kay liye kwda}) ؛ is msaal main ،yad rakhien keh agar di hogi klyd kyshay main mwjwd hay tou chyk kryn۔aghr aysa hawta hay tou ، yeh kyshda wylyw lwtata hay

Question: larywl main aap astsanaa aur ghltaywn ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟kstm astsanaa hayndalrza aur ghltay kay safhaat ki wzuahat kay aml ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: larywl main ، aap kstm astsanaa hayndalrza aur ghltay kay safhaat ka astamal karty hoey mstsanyat aur ghltaywn ko snbhal saktay hayn۔yhaan ayk kdm bha kdm aml haay: astsanaa hayndalngh: larywl aap ki drkhwast kay zaryaha phynk dyiay gaye tamam astsanaa ko snbhalnay kay liye ayk mrkzay mkam fraham krta haay۔kstm astsanaa hayndalrza ki wzuahat karnay kay l you ، aap ayp/mstsanyat/hayndalr daat py py klas main trmym krsktay hayn۔ rpwrt ka tarykha astsanaa ko lagh un karnay kay liye zamha dar haay۔aap astsanaa laghngh slwk ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bna saktay hain ، jesay ay myl ki atalaaat bhyjna ya lagh fail main lkhna

Question: "larywl ka aywnt sstm kya haay؟ aap wakaat ki wzuahat aur bhyjnay ka tarykha kis tarah karty hain ، aur samayn un wakaat ka kya jwab dy saktay hayn؟"
Answer: larywl ka aywnt sstm aap ko wakaat ki wzuahat aur bhyjnay ki ajazat dy kar aap ki drkhwast kay mkhtlf hasawn ko daykpl karnay ka ayk aasan tarykha fraham krta hay ، aur samayn ko un wakaat ka jwab dytay hayn۔yhaan ayk jaizaha hay keh aywnt ka nzaam larywl main kis tarah kam krta haay: aywnt ki taryf: kesi wakaha ki wzuahat kay l you ، aap aywnt ki klas tshkyl dy saktay hain js main larywl ki bys aywnt klas main twsya hawty haay۔aywnt ki klas main aam tawr par aysy khsawsayat shaml hawty hain jo aywnt kay liye mtalkha aadad wa shmar rkhtay hayn۔ py aych py kwpy kwdawza alywmynyt \ faؤndayshn \ wakaat \ daspych aybl ؛ klas aardar hapda {astamal karain daspych aybl ؛awamy $ aardar ؛awamy fnkshn __ knstrkt ($ aardar) {$ this-> aardar = $ aardar ؛}} is msaal main ، aardar kay aadad wa shmar ko rkhnay kay liye aardarsda aywnt klas kay pas $ aardar praprty haay۔ aywnt bhyjna: kesi wakaha ko bhyjnay kay l you ، aap larywl kay aywnt kay mddghar ko astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: larywl kay task shydawlngh kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur larywl kay shydawlr ka astamal karty hoey shydawl kamwn ki wzuahat kesay kryn۔
Answer: larywl ayk task shydawlngh ki khsawsayt mhaya krta hay jo aap ko apni drkhwast kay andr bar bar chlnay waly kamwn ki aml draamd ki wzuahat aur khud kar bnanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔aap rwany aur azahaar psnd nhaw ka astamal karty hoey shydawl kamwn ki wzuahat kay liye larywl shydawlr ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk jaizaha hay keh larwl main task shydawlngh kis tarah kam krty haay: task shydawlngh knfyghryshn: larwyl kay task shydawlr ko ayp \ knswl \ krnl klas main tshkyl diya gaya haay۔as klas main ayk shydawl ka tarykha hay jahan aap apnay shydawl kamwn ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔aap is klas ko ayp/knswl/krnl daat py aych py fail main rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔ shydawl tasks ki wzuahat krna: kesi shydawl task ki wzuahat karnay kay liye ، aap dana klas main dstyab shydawl ka tarykha astamal karty hayn۔yha tarykha aap ko rwany aur azahaar psnd syntax.phpcopy kwda sy tyar shuda fnkshn shydawl (shydawl $ shydawl) {$ shydawl-> kmanda ('ay myl: bhyjyn') -> rwzaanha () -> par astamal karty hoey kam ki tadd aur wkt ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyta haay(''

Question: aap larywl main API ki twsayk ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟twkn ya OAUTH ka astamal karty hoey API ki drkhwastwn ki twsayk kay aml ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: larywl main ، aap apni mkhsawsa zurwryat par mnhasar hay ، twkn ya OAUTH ka astamal karty hoey API ki twsayk ko snbhal saktay hayn۔yhaan ayk jaizaha hay keh aap un tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey API ki drkhwastwn ki twsayk kesay krsktay hayn: twkn par mbny twsayk: twkn par mbny twsayk main hr saarf kay liye ayk anwkha twkn jary karna shaml hay jo bad ki API drkhwastwn ki twsayk kay liye astamal hawta haay۔aml main aam tawr par drj zayl akdamat shaml hawtay hayn: alf۔twkn pyda krna: jab saarf lagh un hawta hay ya is ki twsayk krta hay tou ، aap is saarf kay liye ayk anwkha twkn tyar karty hain aur isy un kay akaؤnt sy jwra dytay hayn۔as kay bad yeh twkn waps klaint (jysay ، mwbail ayp ya frnt aynda) ko bhyja jata hay aur mhafwza tarykay sy mhafwza kya jata haay۔ by۔API ki drkhwastwn main twkn bhi shaml haay: mwkl main hr API drkhwast main twkn shaml hawta hay ، aam tawr par drkhwast kay haydarwn (jysay ، ajazat namha haydar) myn۔ sy۔twkn ki tsadyk krna: srwr saiyda par

Question: larywl afk kya haay؟larywl main ktaar ki nghrany aur un ka antzaam karnay kay liye aap afk ka astamal kesay krsktay hayn؟
Answer: larywl afk ayk taaktwr daysh bwrda aur mynjmnt twl hay jo aap ki drkhwast main ktaar ki nghrany aur antzaam karnay kay liye larywl kay zaryaha fraham kya jata haay۔yha aap ki drkhwast ki ktaar ki nghrany ، mlazamt ki pymaish dykhnay aur ktaar sy mtalk mkhtlf akdamat anjam denay kay liye ayk bdyhay wyb antrfys fraham krta haay۔yhaan ayk jaizaha hay keh aap kis tarah larywl afk ko astamal krsktay hayn: tnsayb aur trtyb: larywl afk ko astamal karnay kay l you ، aap ko kmpwzar kay zaryaha larywl/afk pykyj ko anstal karnay ki zurwrt haay۔tnsayb kay bad ، aap afk knfyghryshn fail ko shaia krsktay hain aur apni zurwryat kay mtaabk isy apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bna saktay hayn۔trtyb kay akhtyarat main rydays knkshn ki wzuahat karna ، karknwn kay aml ki tadad taay karna ، aur afk daysh bwrda ki ajazat ko tshkyl dena shaml haay۔ afk kay aml ko shrwa krna: afk kay aml ko shrwa karnay kay liye ، aap ko mndrjha zayl kmanda ko chlanay ki zurwrt hay

Question: larywl kay aywnt bradakastngh kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh srwr aur mؤkl kay mabyn hakyky wkt kay mwasalat ko kis tarah kabl bnata haay۔
Answer: larywl ki aywnt bradakastngh ayk khsawsayt hay jo wyb sakts ka astamal karty hoey srwr aur klaint ki ayply kyshnza kay mabyn hakyky wkt kay mwasalat ki ajazat dyty haay۔yha aap ko apnay srwr saiyda kwda sy hakyky wkt main mnslk klaint ki ayply kyshnza par prwghram nshr karnay kay kabl bnata haay۔as sy aap ko antrayktw aur bahamy taawn kay sath ayply kyshnza bnanay ki ajazat mlty hay jo mؤklwn ko fwry tawr par ap dayts ko aaghay braha saktay hayn۔ yahan keh larwyl ka wakaha bradakastngh kis tarah kam krta hay is ka ayk jaizaha: bradakastngh daraiywr: larywl ayk sy zayada bradakastngh daraiywrwn ki hamayt krta hay ، js main pshr ، rydays ، aur mkamy nwl daraiywr shaml hayn۔janch kay liay.aap bradakastngh daraiywr ka antkhab krsktay hain jo aap ki zurwryat kay mtaabk ho aur isy apni ayply kyshn ki knfyghryshn fail main tshkyl day۔ aywnt bradakastngh syt ap: larywl main aywnt bradakastngh ko astamal karnay kay l you ، aap ko un wakaat ki wzuahat karnay ki zurwrt hay jo aap nshryaty chynl ko nshr karna chahti hain aur is ki wzuahat karna chahti hayn۔ayk chynl ayk namzad akhttamy nktaha hay js par wakaat ko nshr kya jata haay۔aap aywnt ki klaswn ki wzuahat krsktay hain jo larywl kay rwshn \ maahadwn ko brahatay hain \ bradakastngh \ kyda brdakast antrfys۔aywnt ki klas kay andr ، aap is dayta ki wzuahat karty hain jo mؤklwn ko nshr kya jana chahaiay ۔3

Question: aap larywl main safhaha bndy ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟dayta bys kay ntaij ko safhaha bndy karnay aur safhaha bndy kay lnks ko pysh karnay ki ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer: larywl main ، safhaha bndy ko snbhalna sydha sydha hay aur yeh bnaya jaskta hay js main pyjynyshn ki blt un khsawsayat ka astamal kya jaskta haay۔yhaan aap larywl main safhaha bndy ko snbhal saktay hayn: dayta bys kay ntaij ka safhaha bndy krna: dayta bys kay ntaij ka ayk syt safhaha bndy karnay kay l you ، aap larywl kay astfsar bldar ya fsaahat orm kay zaryaha fraham krdha safhaha () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔safhaha bndy () ka tarykha kar khud bkhwd mtalwbha tadad ko rykarda krta hay aur zurwry safhaha bndy myta dayta tyar krta haay۔// hr safhaay main 10 rykardawn kay sath saarfyn ka safhaha bnaiyn ، is msaal kay tawr par ، safhaha bndy () ka tarykha kar saarfyn ko dayta bys sy bazayaft krta hay aur un ko 10 rykarda fy safhaha kay sath safhaha bndy krta haay۔ntyjay main $ saarfyn aabjykt larywl ki langhwary pyghynytr klas ki ayk msaal hay ، jo safhaha bndy kay sath sath safhaha bndy myta dayta fraham krta haay۔

Question: larywl ki lwklaizayshn ki khsawsayt kya haay؟ksy drkhwast main mtadd zabanwn ki mdd kay liye aap lwklaizayshn ko kis tarah tshkyl dytay hain aur astamal karty hayn؟

Question: larywl ki ajazat ki palysywn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur un ka astamal danay dar rsaiy kntrwl kay kwaad ki wzuahat kay liye kis tarah kya jaskta haay۔
